metadata.name: Service Installed By Unusual Client - System
metadata.comment: Detects a service installed by a client which has PID 0 or whose parent has PID 0

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.log_provider) = lower('service control manager') AND metadata.event_code = 7045 AND process.pid = 0)

output.summary: Detects a service installed by a client which has PID 0 or whose parent has PID 0
